DOC.detailed_description: The investigator register end stage renal disease ( ESRD ) patient receive hemodialysis ( HD ) treatment , develop HD database China . Patients ' demographic characteristic ( include age , gender , height , weight , BMI , smoking , drinking , education ) , clinical characteristic ( include systolic blood pressure , diastolic blood pressure , primary cause ESRD , lab measurement serum , urine , access patency ) , complication , drug information score quality life baseline collect . Patients follow-up every 3 month , demographic clinical characteristic , complication drug information patient collect visit .
